title: London pea soup
ingredients: ['450g dried split peas, soaked overnight', '3 rashers of streaky bacon, diced', '1 carrot, diced', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 leek, diced', '1 clove of garlic', '1 bay leaf', '1 sprig of thyme', '2.5L chicken stock', 'salt and pepper to taste', '200ml cream (add to taste)']
